column3: @promag Yea, the only other place I believe that this change could be applied is: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/test/lint/lint-shell.sh#L54\n\nI'll add that change as well
pleas update the comment as well

Please do not change these lines as it is intended to mimic the way `gitian-builder/bin/gbuild` does: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17361#discussion_r342189958\n\n... and the comment says so ;)
ah gotcha! Thank you for the clarification - will remove this change
